price: 6. Ama gocoyuy yaaqubeeniy kaafuur agleh edde yani, is daray Yallih naqoosa как taaqube, usun ayfuxxukiyyah tet yayfuxxukeeniih, faxxa heen kabul tet beyan.
arabic: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ʿaynan yashrabu bihā ʿibādu al-lahi yufajjirūnahā tafjīran
